addon:addon.name: Groovy Scripting
addon:addon.description: This adds a Groovy script engine.

addon:addon.name: JRuby Scripting
addon:addon.description: This adds a JRuby script engine.

addon:addon.name: JavaScript Scripting
addon:addon.description: This adds a JS (ECMAScript-2021) script engine.

addon:addon.name: JavaScript Scripting (Nashorn)
addon:addon.description: This adds a JS (Nashorn) script engine.

addon:addon.name: Jython Scripting (DEPRECATED)
addon:addon.description: This adds a Jython script engine.

addon:addon.name: PID Controller
addon:addon.description: A PID controller for triggering rules.

addon:addon.name: PWM Controller
addon:addon.description: A trigger module for pulse-width modulation.

addon:addon.name: Adorne Binding
addon:addon.description: The Adorne Binding controls Legrand's Adorne Wi-Fi ready switches and outlets.

addon:addon.name: aha WasteCollection Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding provides information about the upcoming waste collection dates for places, that are served by aha, the waste collection company of the region Hannover. The values are retrieved from the online aha waste collection schedule available at: https://www.aha-region.de/abholtermine/abfuhrkalender.

addon:addon.name: air-Q Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for air-Q devices. The air-Q device contains several sensors measuring gases in the air and other ambiance parameters like noise or temperature. With this binding you can integrate those values into your openHAB system and change parametrs of the air-Q device.

addon:addon.name: Air Quality Binding
addon:addon.description: Measure Air Quality Index and details about pollution particles for a given location.

addon:addon.name: AirVisual Node Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding for AirVisual Node air quality monitor

addon:addon.name: Alarm Decoder Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding is for the Nu Tech Alarm Decoder, used for interfacing with Ademco/Honeywell and DSC alarm systems.

addon:addon.name: AllPlay Binding
addon:addon.description: The AllPlay binding integrates devices compatible with Qualcomm AllPlay.

parameter.name: rewindSkipTimeInSec
parameter.label: Rewind Skip Time
parameter.description: Seconds to jump backwards if the rewind command is executed

parameter.name: fastForwardSkipTimeInSec
parameter.label: Fast Forward Skip Time
parameter.description: Seconds to jump forward if the fastforward command is executed

parameter.name: callbackUrl
parameter.label: Callback URL
parameter.description: URL to use for playing audio streams, e.g. http://192.168.0.2:8080

parameter.name: zoneMemberSeparator
parameter.label: Zone Member Separator
parameter.description: Separator which is used when sending multiple zone members to channel 'zonemembers'

addon:addon.name: @text/bindingName
addon:addon.description: @text/bindingDescription

addon:addon.name: Amazon Echo Control Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding to control Amazon Echo devices (Alexa). This binding enables openHAB to control the volume, playing state, bluetooth connection of your amazon echo devices or allow to use it as TTS device.

addon:addon.name: AmbientWeather Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding supports weather stations from Ambient Weather

addon:addon.name: AmpliPi Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for the AmpliPi Home Audio System from MicroNova.

addon:addon.name: Android Debug Bridge Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for connect to Android devices using the Android Debug Bridge protocol.

parameter.name: discoveryPort
parameter.label: Discovery Port
parameter.description: Port used on discovery to connect to the device through adb.

parameter.name: discoveryReachableMs
parameter.label: Discovery Reachable
parameter.description: Milliseconds to wait while discovering to determine if the ip is reachable.

parameter.name: discoveryIpRangeMin
parameter.label: Discovery Range IP Min
parameter.description: Used to limit the numbers of ips checked while discovering.

parameter.name: discoveryIpRangeMax
parameter.label: Discovery Range IP Max
parameter.description: Used to limit the numbers of ips checked while discovering.

addon:addon.name: AndroidTV Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the add-on for AndroidTV.

addon:addon.name: Anel NET-PwrCtrl Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Anel NET-PwrCtrl devices.

addon:addon.name: Anthem Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Anthem AV preamp/processors

addon:addon.name: Astro Binding
addon:addon.description: The Astro binding calculates astronomical data from sun and moon.

addon:addon.name: Asuswrt Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding for ASUS routers (Asuswrt / Asuswrt-Merlin only)

addon:addon.name: Atlona Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding for Atlona PRO3 HDBaseT Matrix switches.

addon:addon.name: Autelis Pool Control Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for a Autelis pool controller.

addon:addon.name: Automower Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding to interact with Husquvarna Automower robots.

addon:addon.name: AVM FRITZ! Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for AVM FRITZ! devices.

addon:addon.name: aWATTar Binding
addon:addon.description: Hourly Electricity Prices for Germany and Austria.

addon:addon.name: BenQ Projector Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding is compatible with BenQ projectors

addon:addon.name: BigAssFan Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for BigAssFan.

addon:addon.name: Bluetooth Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding supports the Bluetooth protocol.

addon:addon.name: Bond Home Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for the Bond Bridge for Ceiling Fans and other RF devices.

addon:addon.name: BoschIndego Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Bosch Indego Connect lawn mowers.

addon:addon.name: Bosch Smart Home Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Bosch Smart Home.

addon:addon.name: Bose SoundTouch Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Bose SoundTouch devices.

addon:addon.name: Broadlinkthermostat Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Broadlinkthermostat devices.

addon:addon.name: BSB-LAN Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding for BSB-LAN Gateway.

addon:addon.name: BTicino Smarther Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for BTicino Smarther chronothermostat units

addon:addon.name: Buienradar Binding
addon:addon.description: The Buienradar Binding periodically (5 minutes) retrieves results from the Buienradar API. For personal use only.

addon:addon.name: Caddx Security Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding for Caddx security system with RS232 serial interface.

addon:addon.name: C-Bus Binding
addon:addon.description: Clipsal C-Bus Binding

addon:addon.name: ChatGPT Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding allows interaction with OpenAI's ChatGPT.

addon:addon.name: Chromecast Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Google Chromecast devices.

parameter.name: callbackUrl
parameter.label: Callback URL
parameter.description: url to use for playing notification sounds, e.g. http://192.168.0.2:8080

addon:addon.name: CM11A Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for the X10 Cm11a interface

addon:addon.name: ComfoAir Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for ComfoAir.

addon:addon.name: CoolMasterNet Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding for Cool Automation CoolMasterNet HVAC controllers.

addon:addon.name: CoronaStats Binding
addon:addon.description: This is a binding for accessing data from https://corona-stats.online/ website.

addon:addon.name: Daikin Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Daikin A/C units.

addon:addon.name: DALI Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for controlling lights using the Digital Addressable Lighting Interface (DALI).

addon:addon.name: DanfossAirUnit Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Danfoss Air heat recovery ventilation units.

addon:addon.name: DBQuery Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for DBQuery that allows to execute native database queries and bind their results to items.

addon:addon.name: deCONZ Binding
addon:addon.description: Allows to use the real-time channel of the deCONZ software for Zigbee sensors and switches. deCONZ is the accompanying software for the Raspbee and ConBee Zigbee dongles from Dresden Elektronik. Is meant to be used together with the HUE binding which makes the lights and plugs available.

addon:addon.name: DenonMarantz Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding for controlling network enabled Denon and Marantz receivers.

addon:addon.name: Deutsche Bahn Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding provides timetable information for train stations of Deutsche Bahn.

addon:addon.name: Digiplex/EVO Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding for Digiplex/EVO alarm systems (utilizing PRT3 module)

addon:addon.name: @text/binding_name

addon:addon.name: D-Link Smart Home Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for D-Link Smart Home devices

addon:addon.name: DMX Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for DMX.

addon:addon.name: Dominoswiss Binding
addon:addon.description: The Dominoswiss Binding interacts with the Dominoswiss eGate G1 Gateway to control blinds

addon:addon.name: Doorbird Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Doorbird video doorbells.

addon:addon.name: DraytonWiser Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Drayton Wiser smart heating system.

addon:addon.name: DSCAlarm Binding
addon:addon.description: The DSCAlarm binding interfaces with a DSC PowerSeries Alarm System through the EyezOn Envisalink 3/2DS interface or the DSC IT-100 RS-232 interface.

addon:addon.name: DSMR Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding integrates Dutch, Belgium, Luxembourg and Austrian Smart Meters

addon:addon.description: This is the binding for DWD Pollenflug.

addon:addon.name: DWD Unwetter Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for DWD Unwetter.

addon:addon.name: Easee Binding

addon:addon.name: EchonetLite Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for EchonetLite.

addon:addon.name: Ecobee Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Ecobee smart thermostats.

addon:addon.name: EcoTouch Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for a Waterkotte EcoTouch heat pump.

addon:addon.name: Ecovacs Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Ecovacs Deebot vacuum cleaners.

addon:addon.name: Ecowatt Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding uses the Ecowatt API to expose clear signals to adopt the right gestures and to ensure a good supply of electricity for all in Frances.

addon:addon.name: Ekey Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for connecting openHAB to Ekey fingerprint scanners.

addon:addon.name: ElectroluxAir Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Electrolux Pure A9 Air Purifier.

addon:addon.name: Elero Transmitter Stick Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Elero Transmitter Sticks.

addon:addon.name: ELRO Connects Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for the ELRO Connects smart home system.

addon:addon.name: Energenie Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Energenie.

addon:addon.name: Energi Data Service Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Energi Data Service providing open energy data from Energinet.

addon:addon.name: Enigma2 Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Enigma2.

addon:addon.name: EnOcean Binding
addon:addon.description: The EnOcean binding integrates the EnOcean system into openHAB.

addon:addon.name: Enphase Envoy Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Enphase Envoy solar panels.

addon:addon.name: Entur Binding
addon:addon.description: Real-time timetable binding for Norwegian public transport operators.

addon:addon.name: Epson Projector Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding is compatible with Epson projectors which support the ESC/VP21 protocol

addon:addon.name: EtherRain Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for EtherRain

addon:addon.name: evcc Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for evcc (electric vehicle charging control) - soak up the sun.

addon:addon.name: evohome Binding
addon:addon.description: The evohome binding controls the Honeywell evohome system.

addon:addon.name: Exec Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding to execute arbitrary shell commands

addon:addon.name: Feed Binding
addon:addon.description: The Feed Binding downloads Feed data from URL, displays information about the feed (number of Entries, last published date, author, feed title and description, last entry) and tracks for changes in the Feed at intervals.

addon:addon.name: Feican Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Feican light bulbs.

addon:addon.name: Fine Offset Weather Station
addon:addon.description: A binding for the Weather Stations Manufactured by Fine Offset

addon:addon.name: FlicButton Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Flic buttons by Shortcut Labs.

addon:addon.name: FMI Weather Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Finnish Meteorological Institute (FMI) Weather

addon:addon.name: FolderWatcher Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding will monitor specified location for new files and trigger event channel with new file names.

addon:addon.name: Folding@home
addon:addon.description: Control Folding@home clients on computers.

addon:addon.name: Foobot
addon:addon.description: Foobot binding allow users to connect to their foobots in home or office and get real-time updates on the Air Quality.

addon:addon.name: Freebox Binding
addon:addon.description: The Freebox binding requests your Freebox Server for various operational informations.

addon:addon.name: Freebox OS Binding
addon:addon.description: The Freebox OS binding integrates Free equipments in your home automation.

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.label: Timeout
parameter.description: The timeout for reading from the API in seconds.

parameter.name: callbackUrl
parameter.label: Callback URL
parameter.description: URL to use for playing notification sounds hosted by openHAB, e.g. 'http://192.168.0.2:8080'

addon:addon.name: Fronius Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding for Fronius inverters.

addon:addon.name: FSInternetRadio Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for internet radios based on the Frontier Silicon chipset.

addon:addon.name: FTP Upload Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding is for receiving files via FTP.

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: TCP Port
parameter.description: TCP port of the FTP server

parameter.name: idleTimeout
parameter.label: Idle Timeout
parameter.description: The number of seconds before an inactive client is disconnected. If this value is set to 0, the idle time is disabled.

parameter.name: passivePorts
parameter.label: Passive Port Range
parameter.description: A string of passive ports, can contain a single port (as an integer), multiple ports seperated by commas (e.g. 123,124,125) or ranges of ports, including open ended ranges (e.g. 123-125, 30000-, -1023). Combinations for single ports and ranges is also supported. Empty (default) allows all ports as passive ports.

addon:addon.name: Gardena Smart System Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Gardena smart system.

addon:addon.name: GCE Electronics Binding
addon:addon.description: Provides access to IPX800 PLC build by GCE.

addon:addon.name: GeneracMobileLink Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding monitors Generac manufactured generators through the MobileLink cloud service.

addon:addon.name: GlobalCache Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding for GlobalCache iTach and GC-100 devices supporting infrared, serial, and contact closure interfaces.

addon:addon.name: Go-eCharger Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Go-eCharger.

addon:addon.name: GPIO Binding
addon:addon.description: Adds GPIO support to openHAB.

addon:addon.name: GPSTracker Binding
addon:addon.description: GPS tracking with OwnTracks and GPSLogger support over HTTP

addon:addon.name: GREE Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for GREE air conditioners.

addon:addon.name: GROHE ONDUS Binding
addon:addon.description: Provides an integration for GROHE Appliances in openHAB

addon:addon.name: Groupe PSA Binding
addon:addon.description: Provides information and (limited) control of cars from the Groupe PSA (Peugeot, Citroen, Opel, etc.).

addon:addon.name: Guntamatic Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding for Guntamatic Heating Systems.

addon:addon.name: Haas and Sohn Pelletstove Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding communicates with Haas and Sohn Pelletstoves through the optional WIFI module. It allows to power the stove on and off and receives different operation information.

addon:addon.name: HarmonyHub Binding
addon:addon.description: The HarmonyHub Binding integrates Logitech Harmony hubs and remotes.

addon:addon.name: Hayward OmniLogix Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding for the Hayward OmniLogix swimming pool automation controller.

addon:addon.name: HCC Rubbish Collection Binding
addon:addon.description: Get the rubbish collection dates for Hamilton City Council (New Zealand).

addon:addon.name: openHAB HDanywhere Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for HDanywhere HDMI Matrices

addon:addon.name: Hunter Douglas PowerView Binding
addon:addon.description: The Hunter Douglas PowerView binding provides access to the Hunter Douglas line of PowerView shades.

addon:addon.name: Helios Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Helios IP (Vario/...) class of intercom/(video)doorstations.

addon:addon.name: HeliosVentilation Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Helios Ventilation Systems KWL EC 200/300/500 Pro. It requires a connection to the RS485 bus used by the original remote controls KWL-FB (9417).

addon:addon.name: HEOS Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding for the Denon HEOS system.

addon:addon.name: Herzborg Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Herzborg smart curtain motors.

addon:addon.name: Home Connect Binding
addon:addon.description: The binding integrates the Home Connect (https://www.home-connect.com/) system into openHAB. It connects to household devices from brands like Bosch and Siemens.

addon:addon.name: Homematic Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Homematic gateways

addon:addon.name: HomeWizard Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding provides access to the data provided by the HomeWizard Wi-Fi P1 meter on it's local HTTP interface.

addon:addon.name: HP Printer Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding for HP Printers with Embedded Web Servers

addon:addon.name: HTTP Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for retrieving and processing HTTP resources.

addon:addon.name: Hue Binding
addon:addon.description: The Hue Binding integrates the Philips Hue system. It allows to control Hue bulbs.

addon:addon.name: Hydrawise Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Hydrawise irrigation systems.

addon:addon.name: Hyperion Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding integrates openHAB with the Hyperion ambient lighting software.

addon:addon.name: Iammeter Binding
addon:addon.description: The Iammeter binding pull your Iammeter power meter data from LAN.

addon:addon.name: iAquaLink Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for a iAquaLink pool controller.

addon:addon.name: iCalendar Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding for using iCal calendars

addon:addon.name: IHC / ELKO Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding to communicate IHC / ELKO controller

addon:addon.name: Insteon Binding

addon:addon.name: Intesis Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Intesis WiFi adapters used in various AC devices.

addon:addon.name: IpCamera Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding interfaces IP cameras of various vendors via open protocols.

addon:addon.name: IpObserver Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for weather stations marketed under many brands that come with or have an IpObserver station connected.

addon:addon.name: IPP Binding

addon:addon.description: This is the binding for iRobot vacuum robots.

addon:addon.description: This is the binding for IRtrans (www.irtrans.de) Transceivers

addon:addon.description: This is the binding for the ISM8 card used for Wolf heating systems or other Wolf eBus devices.

addon:addon.name: Jablotron Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Jablotron Alarm Systems.

addon:addon.name: Kaleidescape Binding

addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Keba EV Charging Stations

addon:addon.description: The KM200 Binding is communicating with a Buderus Logamatic web KM200 / KM100 / KM50 gateway. These devices are gateways for heating systems and allows to control them. It is possible to receive and send parameters.

addon:addon.description: This binding supports connecting to a KNX bus

addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Kodi.

addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Leap Motion controllers.

addon:addon.description: Controlling LG TVs using serial (RS232C) protocol

addon:addon.name: LG webOS Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding to connect LG's WebOS based smart TVs

addon:addon.name: LIFX Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for LIFX lights.

addon:addon.name: Linky Binding
addon:addon.description: Retrieves your energy consumption data from Enedis website

addon:addon.name: LinuxInput Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for LinuxInput.

addon:addon.name: LiquidCheck Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for LiquidCheck devices.

addon:addon.name: LIRC Binding
addon:addon.description: The LIRC binding allows transmission and receipt of standard infrared remote control signals via a LIRC server.

addon:addon.name: LIVISI SmartHome Binding
addon:addon.description: The LIVISI SmartHome binding integrates your LIVISI SmartHome system.

addon:addon.name: LogReader Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding that reads through log files and searches e.g. errors and warnings

addon:addon.name: Loxone Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Loxone Miniserver

addon:addon.name: Lutron Binding
addon:addon.description: The Lutron binding interfaces with Lutron lighting control and home automation systems such as RadioRA, RadioRA 2, HomeWorks, HomeWorks QS, RA2 Select, Caseta, and GRAFIK Eye.

addon:addon.name: Luxom Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Luxom bus system (https://www.luxom.io/)

addon:addon.name: Luxtronik Heatpump Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for a Heatpump with Luxtronik control.

addon:addon.name: MagentaTV Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for MagentaTV receivers

addon:addon.name: Mail Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding is used to access POP3, IMAP and SMTP servers.

addon:addon.name: MAX! Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for the eQ-3 MAX! Home Solution.

addon:addon.name: MCD Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding allows you to send sensor events from your openHAB environment to the cloud application Managing Care Digital (MCD) by C&S Computer und Software GmbH (https://www.managingcare.de/). MCD is the platform for inpatient and outpatient nursing services. Our REST API allows you to send a variety of sensor events to the system and thus being able to connect your Ambient Assisted Living (AAL) or smart home environment to the documentation software of your nursing service. Please note that a valid account is needed to access MCD and the Sensor API.

addon:addon.name: MCP23017 Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for MCP23017 I/O expansion chips.

addon:addon.name: MEATER Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for MEATER probe.

addon:addon.name: mecMeter Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for the din-rail power meter from MEC.

addon:addon.name: MELCloud Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding for Mitsubishi MELCloud connected A.C. devices.

addon:addon.name: Mercedes Me Binding
addon:addon.description: The binding provides access to your Mercedes developer account and vehicles

addon:addon.name: Meteo Alerte Binding
addon:addon.description: Retrieves Meteo Alert levels in France

addon:addon.name: meteoblue Binding
addon:addon.description: The meteoblue binding retrieves weather information from the meteoblue weather service.

addon:addon.name: MeteoStick Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for MeteoStick USB weather station receiver.

addon:addon.name: Miele Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Miele@home appliances

addon:addon.name: @text/addon.mielecloud.name
addon:addon.description: @text/addon.mielecloud.description

addon:addon.name: Xiaomi Mi Smart Home Binding
addon:addon.description: Connects to Xiaomi Smart Gateway v2 and allows to communicate with Xiaomi Mi Smart Home suite (also called Xiaomi Aqara). The Gateway connects with a range of Xiaomi Zigbee sensors such as Wireless Switches, Wall Plugs or Temperature Sensors.

addon:addon.name: Xiaomi Wifi devices (Mi IO) Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding for Xiaomi wifi devices (Mi IO protocol) which are normally controlled by the mihome app like Mi Robot Vacuums, Yeelights, Humidifiers, Fans etc.

parameter.name: username
parameter.label: Xiaomi cloud username
parameter.description: Xiaomi cloud username. Typically your email

parameter.name: country
parameter.label: Xiaomi server country
parameter.description: Xiaomi server country(s) (e.g. sg,de). Separate multiple servers with comma. Leave empty for all. See binding readme for country to server mapping

parameter.name: cloudDiscoveryMode
parameter.label: Cloud Discovery Mode
parameter.description: Allow for discovery via the cloud. This may be used for devices that are not on the same network as OpenHAB server

options.option: Discover online supported devices from Xiaomi cloud
Discover all on & offline devices from Xiaomi cloud (advanced, see readme for usage)

addon:addon.name: Mikrotik Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for integrating Mikrotik RouterOS powered devices (routers, access points, switches, etc) to facilitate WiFi clients and network interface tracking.

addon:addon.name: Milight Binding
addon:addon.description: A binding for Milight/Easybulb/compatible white, color and color+white bulbs.

addon:addon.name: Millheat Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Mill Heat Wi-Fi enabled heaters. See https://www.millheat.com/mill-wifi/

addon:addon.name: Minecraft Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding can integrate Minecraft servers.

addon:addon.name: Modbus Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding for Modbus

addon:addon.name: Monoprice Whole House Audio Binding
addon:addon.description: Controls Monoprice, Dayton Audio and Xantech Whole House Amplifiers.

addon:addon.name: MPD Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for the Music Player Daemon.

addon:addon.name: MQTT Binding
addon:addon.description: Allows management of MQTT broker connections and linking of MQTT topics to Things and Channels

addon:addon.name: MyBMW
addon:addon.description: Provides access to your Vehicle Data like MyBMW App

addon:addon.name: Mycroft Binding
addon:addon.description: Connects to a Mycroft instance in order to receive information from, and send commands to it. Typical usage includes triggering Mycroft to listen (as if a wake word was detected), sending text for Mycroft to speak, reacting on some specific intent, command skills by faking a spoken utterance, etc.

addon:addon.name: MyNice Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding lets you connect to your IT4Wifi Nice device.

addon:addon.name: MyQ Binding
addon:addon.description: The MyQ binding allows monitoring and control of garage doors that are MyQ enabled.

addon:addon.name: myStrom Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for myStrom devices.

addon:addon.name: @text/addon.nanoleaf.name
addon:addon.description: @text/addon.nanoleaf.description

addon:addon.name: Neato Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Neato.

addon:addon.name: Neeo Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding allows you to discover NEEO Brain(s), discover the Rooms within and the Devices within those Rooms. The binding then will expose that information to openHAB and allow you to execute Recipes/Scenarios and Macros on the Devices

addon:addon.name: NeoHub Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Heatmiser NeoHub devices

addon:addon.name: Nest Binding
addon:addon.description: Nest connects to the Nest cloud and allows control of the various Nest devices.

addon:addon.name: Netatmo Binding
addon:addon.description: The Netatmo binding integrates Weather Station with companion modules, Healthy Home Coach, Thermostat Plug and Welcome Camera.

parameter.name: readFriends
parameter.label: Access Guests
parameter.description: For Weather Stations: A friend gave you access to their Netatmo Weather Station.

addon:addon.name: Network Binding
addon:addon.description: The Network Binding can be used for device presence detection and to determine network device health

parameter.name: allowSystemPings
parameter.label: Allow System Pings
parameter.description: Allows or disallows to use system pings next to the java integrated ping functionality. On windows the system ping works more reliable most of the time.

parameter.name: allowDHCPlisten
parameter.label: Listen for DHCP Requests
parameter.description: Usually a device requests an IP address in an IPv4 network with the help of DHCP as soon as it enters a network. If we listen to those packets, we can detect a device presence even faster. You need elevated access rights (see readme) for this to work.

parameter.name: cacheDeviceStateTimeInMS
parameter.label: Cache Time
parameter.description: The result of a device presence detection is cached for a small amount of time. Be aware that no new pings will be issued within this time frame, even if explicitly requested.

parameter.name: arpPingToolPath
parameter.label: ARP Ping Tool Path
parameter.description: If your arp ping tool is not called arping and cannot be found in the PATH environment, you can configure the absolute path / tool name here.

parameter.name: preferResponseTimeAsLatency
parameter.label: Use Response Time as Latency
parameter.description: If enabled, an attempt will be made to extract the latency from the output of the ping command. If no such latency value is found in the ping command output, the time to execute the ping command is used as fallback latency. If disabled, the time to execute the ping command is always used as latency value.

addon:addon.name: Network UPS Tools Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding for connecting to Network UPS Tools (NUT) servers

addon:addon.name: NibeHeatPump Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Nibe heat pumps.

addon:addon.name: NibeUplink Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for NibeUplink.

addon:addon.name: Nikobus Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Nikobus.

addon:addon.name: @text/bindingName
addon:addon.description: @text/bindingDescription

addon:addon.name: Glen Dimplex Nobø Hub Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Glen Dimplex Nobø Hub.

addon:addon.name: NovaFineDust Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Nova Fitness Fine Dust SDS011 sensor.

addon:addon.name: NTP Binding
addon:addon.description: The NTP Binding polls the configured timeserver and post the current date and time.

addon:addon.name: Nuki Binding
addon:addon.description: The Nuki Binding allows simple and fast integration of Nuki Smart Locks into openHAB. This binding needs the Nuki Smart Lock(s) to be paired via Bluetooth with a Nuki Bridge to function correctly.

addon:addon.name: Nuvo Whole House Audio Binding
addon:addon.description: Controls the Nuvo Grand Concerto or Essentia G Whole House Amplifier.

addon:addon.name: NZ Water Alerts Binding
addon:addon.description: Water Alert Levels for New Zealand water supply.

addon:addon.name: openHAB Oceanic Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Oceanic Water Softener.

addon:addon.name: OJElectronics Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for OJElectronics.

addon:addon.name: OmnikInverter Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for the Omnik solar grid inverters. The integration is based on the undocumented API, which is reverse engineered at https://github.com/Woutrrr/Omnik-Data-Logger. As such, the known supported inverters are known to work with inverters with wifi bridge which start with the serial number '602' and '606'.

addon:addon.name: OmniLink Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for OmniLink, a security system that interfaces with many devices.

addon:addon.name: OneBusAway Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for OneBusAway, an open system to provide transit data.

addon:addon.name: OneWire Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for OneWire.

addon:addon.name: OneWireGPIO Binding
addon:addon.description: Use GPIO in various devices like RaspberryPi to communicate the OneWire protocol

addon:addon.name: Onkyo Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Onkyo receivers.

parameter.name: callbackUrl
parameter.label: Callback URL
parameter.description: url to use for playing notification sounds, e.g. http://192.168.0.2:8080

addon:addon.name: OpenGarage Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for OpenGarage.

addon:addon.name: OpenSprinkler Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for OpenSprinkler.

addon:addon.name: OpenTherm Gateway Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for the OpenTherm Gateway, designed by Schelte Bron. For more information about the OpenTherm Gateway please see http://otgw.tclcode.com/

addon:addon.name: OpenUV Binding
addon:addon.description: Global Real-Time UV Index Forecast API

addon:addon.name: OpenWeatherMap Binding
addon:addon.description: OpenWeatherMap - Current weather and forecasts in your city.

addon:addon.name: OpenWebNet (BTicino/Legrand) Binding
addon:addon.description: The OpenWebNet Binding integrates the BTicino/Legrand 'MyHOME' connected home system using the OpenWebNet protocol. It supports BUS (SCS) and Zigbee USB gateways and devices.

addon:addon.name: Oppo Blu-ray Player Binding
addon:addon.description: Controls Oppo UDP-203/205 and BDP-83/93/95/103/105 Blu-ray Players

addon:addon.name: Orbit B-hyve Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Orbit B-hyve Wi-Fi irrigation systems.

addon:addon.name: Orvibo Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Orvibo devices.

addon:addon.name: ParadoxAlarm Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for ParadoxAlarm.

addon:addon.name: Pentair Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Pentair pool systems.

addon:addon.name: PHC Binding
addon:addon.description: This is a binding for PHC modules (EM, AM, JRM and DIM). It communicates with the PHC Modulbus (RS485).

addon:addon.name: Pilight Binding
addon:addon.description: The pilight binding allows openHAB to communicate with a pilight instance. Pilight is a service used to control 'Click On Click Off' devices like 433 MHz remote controlled sockets a cheap way, e.g. by using a Raspberry Pi with corresponding 433 MHz sender.

addon:addon.name: PioneerAvr Binding
addon:addon.description: A binding for Pioneer AVRs.

addon:addon.name: Pixometer Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding integrates meter data through pixometer.

addon:addon.name: PJLinkDevice Binding
addon:addon.description:
This binding can control PJLink compatible devices.
The PJLink protocol was mainly standardized for digital projectors, but some other types of devices also use it, in particular TV screens.

addon:addon.name: Sony PlayStation Binding
addon:addon.description: Monitor and control your Sony PlayStation.

addon:addon.name: PLCLogo Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding provides native support for Siemens LOGO! PLC.

addon:addon.name: Plex Binding
addon:addon.description: Monitor your PLEX server and players

addon:addon.name: Plugwise Binding
addon:addon.description: Monitor and control Plugwise ZigBee devices using the Stick. Supported devices are the Circle, Circle+, Scan, Sense, Stealth and Switch.

addon:addon.name: Plugwise Home Automation Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding supports the Plugwise Home Automation 'Adam' gateway. It allows users to access temperature controls of zones defined on the gateway

addon:addon.name: Powermax Binding
addon:addon.description: The Powermax binding interfaces with Visonic PowerMax and PowerMaster alarm panel series.

addon:addon.name: Proteus EcoMeter
addon:addon.description: Puts your EcoMeter data into openHAB

addon:addon.name: Prowl Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Prowl.

addon:addon.name: Public Transport Switzerland Binding
addon:addon.description: Connects to the "Swiss public transport API" to provide real-time public transport information.

addon:addon.name: Pulseaudio Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Pulseaudio.

parameter.name: sink
parameter.label: Import Sinks
parameter.description: Activate the import of sink elements.

parameter.name: sinkInput
parameter.label: Import Sink Inputs
parameter.description: Activate the import of sink-input elements.

parameter.name: source
parameter.label: Import Sources
parameter.description: Activate the import of source elements.

parameter.name: sourceOutput
parameter.label: Import Source Outputs
parameter.description: Activate the import of source-output elements.

addon:addon.name: @text/addon.pushbullet.name
addon:addon.description: @text/addon.pushbullet.description

addon:addon.name: Pushover Binding
addon:addon.description: Pushover - Simple Notifications.

addon:addon.name: Pushsafer Binding
addon:addon.description: With Pushsafer you can send & receive push notifications in real time, easily and securely on your iPhone, iPad, Android, Windows mobile or Windows desktop device as well as on your browser (Chrome, Firefox, Opera & Yandex)!

addon:addon.name: Qbus Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for the Qbus home automation system. Qbus is a system made and developed in Belgium (https://www.qbus.be/nl-nl)

addon:addon.name: QolsysIQ Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Qolsys IQ Alarm Systems.

addon:addon.name: Radio Thermostat Binding
addon:addon.description: Controls the RadioThermostat model CT30, CT50 or CT80 via the built-in WIFI module

addon:addon.name: RegoHeatPump Binding
addon:addon.description: The Rego controller based heat pumps binding.

addon:addon.name: Remote openHAB Binding
addon:addon.description: The Remote openHAB binding allows to communicate with remote openHAB servers.

addon:addon.name: Renault Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Renault electric cars.

addon:addon.name: Resol Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Resol solar and system controllers (including branded versions).

addon:addon.name: Revogi Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Revogi devices. Revogi is a vendor of several smart home devices like light bulbs, power strips and sensors.

addon:addon.name: RFXCOM Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for RFXCOM transceivers.

addon:addon.name: openHAB RME Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for RME Rain Manager.

addon:addon.name: Robonect Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Robonect.

addon:addon.name: Roku Binding
addon:addon.description: Controls Roku Streaming Media Players and TVs

addon:addon.name: Rotel Binding
addon:addon.description: The Rotel binding controls a Rotel audio device like a surround processor, a surround receiver, a stereo preamplifier, an integrated amplifier, a CD player or a tuner.

addon:addon.name: Russound Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Russound Whole House Audio systems (MCA and X-Systems).

addon:addon.name: @text/bindingName
addon:addon.description: @text/bindingDescription

addon:addon.name: Samsung TV Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Samsung TV. Binding should support all Samsung TV C (2010), D (2011) and E (2012) models

addon:addon.name: Satel Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Satel INTEGRA alarm systems using either ETHM-1 or INT-RS communication module

addon:addon.name: SEMSPortal Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for SEMSPortal. The SEMS portal is where a GoodWE solar installation uploads it's data. The SEMS portal has a lot of data, only a few of them are currently mapped to a channel. You will need an account at semsportal.com and have your solar installation registered on that account.

addon:addon.name: SenecHome Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for SenecHome.

addon:addon.name: Seneye Binding
addon:addon.description: The seneye binding polls the seneye API for your aquarium readings.

addon:addon.name: senseBox Binding
addon:addon.description: The senseBox binding imports data from the senseBox Citizen Science project.

addon:addon.name: Sensibo Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Sensibo products

addon:addon.name: Sensor.Community Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding to integrate DIY Sensors from Sensor.Community

addon:addon.name: Serial Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding supports sending/receiving data to/from a serial port

addon:addon.name: Serial Button Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding supports physical push buttons connected to a serial port.

addon:addon.name: @text/addon.shelly.name
addon:addon.description: @text/addon.shelly.description

parameter.name: defaultUserId
parameter.label: @text/addon.shelly.config.defaultUserId.label
parameter.description: @text/addon.shelly.config.defaultUserId.description

parameter.name: defaultPassword
parameter.label: @text/addon.shelly.config.defaultPassword.label
parameter.description: @text/addon.shelly.config.defaultPassword.description

parameter.name: localIP
parameter.label: @text/addon.shelly.config.localIP.label
parameter.description: @text/addon.shelly.config.localIP.description

parameter.name: autoCoIoT
parameter.label: @text/addon.shelly.config.autoCoIoT.label
parameter.description: @text/addon.shelly.config.autoCoIoT.description

addon:addon.name: Siemens RDS Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Siemens RDS smart thermostats

addon:addon.name: Silvercrest Wifi Socket Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Silvercrest Wifi Socket sold by Lidl.

addon:addon.name: Sinopé Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Sinopé. Sinopé provides high-quality, energy-efficient products and with innovative technology solutions that will meet customer's current and future needs: low and high voltage thermostats, light switches, water leak detectors and load controllers.

addon:addon.name: SleepIQ Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for the Sleep Number SleepIQ system.

addon:addon.name: SMA Energy Meter Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding for a SMA Energy Meter.

addon:addon.name: Smartmeter Binding
addon:addon.description: The Smartmeter binding is able to read SML messages (PUSH) and supports IEC 62056-21 modes A,B,C (PULL) and D (PUSH).

addon:addon.name: Samsung Smartthings Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for the Samsung Smartthings hub.

addon:addon.name: SMHI Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding for getting weather forecasts from the Swedish Meteorological and Hydrological Institute (SMHI)

addon:addon.name: SMSModem Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding handles a GSM modem connected to the openHAB server (Serial), or exposed on the network. It can send and receive SMS.

addon:addon.name: SNCF Binding
addon:addon.description: Retrieves French railway informations

addon:addon.name: SNMP Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for SNMP.

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Incoming SNMP Port
parameter.description: Port for receiving traps, set to 0 to disable.

addon:addon.name: SolarEdge Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for SolarEdge.

addon:addon.name: Solar-Log Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for the Solar-Log product range developed and sold by Solare Datensysteme GmbH. The Solar-Log devices allow monitoring of Photovoltaic (PV) installations and provide a JSON API to extract data. This includes information about current energy production and use, and other vital parameters of a PV installation. This binding makes this data accessible to openHAB from where it can be persistently stored, used to trigger actions or be displayed for information.

addon:addon.name: SolarMax Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for SolarMax power inverters, particularly the MT Series

addon:addon.name: Solarwatt Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Solarwatt Energymanager.

addon:addon.name: Solax Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Solax inverters.

addon:addon.name: Somfy MyLink Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Somfy MyLink.

addon:addon.name: SomfyTahoma Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Somfy Tahoma and Somfy Connexoon home automation systems and for any other system based on the OverKiz API.

addon:addon.name: Somneo Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Philips Somneo devices.

addon:addon.name: Sonnen Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding communicates with a solar battery from sonnen.

addon:addon.name: Sonos Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for the Sonos multi-room audio system.

parameter.name: opmlUrl
parameter.label: OPML Service URL
parameter.description: URL for the OPML/tunein.com service

parameter.name: callbackUrl
parameter.label: Callback URL
parameter.description: URL to use for playing notification sounds, e.g. http://192.168.0.2:8080

addon:addon.name: SonyAudio Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for SonyAudio products (Receivers and wireless speakers).

addon:addon.name: SonyProjector Binding
addon:addon.description: The SonyProjector binding controls a Sony projector through Ethernet (PJ Talk) or serial.

addon:addon.name: Souliss Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Souliss. The Arduino based SmartHome..

addon:addon.name: Speedtest Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding for Ookla Speedtest (https://www.speedtest.net/)

addon:addon.name: Spotify Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the openHAB binding for Spotify used to manage Connect devices. Using the Spotify WebAPI.

addon:addon.name: SqueezeBox Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for the Logitech Squeeze Server and Players.

parameter.name: callbackUrl
parameter.label: Callback URL
parameter.description: URL to use for playing notification sounds, e.g. http://192.168.0.2:8080

addon:addon.name: Sure Petcare Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding interacts with the Sure Petcare Connect range of cat flaps and feeders

addon:addon.name: Synop Analyzer Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding to download and interpret Synop messages

addon:addon.name: Systeminfo Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding provides information about the operating system and the hardware.

addon:addon.name: TA C.M.I. Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for TA C.M.I.

addon:addon.name: tado° Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding for tado° devices

addon:addon.name: Tankerkönig Binding
addon:addon.description: The Tankerkönig Binding allows to poll fuel prices of German gas stations by using the Tankerkoenig.de API.

addon:addon.name: TapoControl Binding
addon:addon.description: Control your TAPO-SmartHome Devices

addon:addon.name: Telegram Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Telegram. It allows to send and receive messages.

addon:addon.name: Teleinfo Binding
addon:addon.description: The Teleinfo binding decodes the electrical statistics from an ENEDIS/ERDF Electricity Meter

addon:addon.name: Tellstick Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Telldus Tellstick Basic, Duo, .Net and Z-Net Lite.

addon:addon.name: Tesla Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Tesla Electric Vehicles.

addon:addon.name: Tibber Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding retrieves price and consumption data from Tibber API using queries and live subscription

addon:addon.name: TiVo DVR Binding
addon:addon.description: Controls TiVo DVRs that support the TiVo TCP Control Protocol v1.1

addon:addon.name: TouchWand Binding
addon:addon.description: Connect to TouchWand Wanderfull™ Hub and communicate with units connected to the controller.

addon:addon.name: TpLinkRouter Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for controlling a TP-Link router with telnet.

addon:addon.name: TP-Link Smart Home Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding integrates the TP-Link Wi-Fi Smart Home devices.

addon:addon.name: TR-064 Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for TR-064 device support.

addon:addon.name: TRÅDFRI Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding supports IKEA TRÅDFRI lighting devices through the IKEA gateway.

addon:addon.name: Twitter Binding
addon:addon.description: Supports adding Thing for getting the Last Tweet. Send Tweets and Pictures with Actions.

addon:addon.name: UniFi Binding
addon:addon.description: The UniFi binding integrates the UniFi controller from Ubiquiti Networks to facilitate tracking of Wi-Fi clients.

addon:addon.name: Unified Remote Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Unified Remote Server (https://www.unifiedremote.com/).

addon:addon.name: UPB Binding
addon:addon.description: The Universal Powerline Bus (UPB) binding reads and writes messages to and from a UPB modem

parameter.name: networkId
parameter.label: Default Network ID for Devices
parameter.description: The ID of the primary UPB network. May be overridden on a per-device basis.

addon:addon.name: UPnP Control Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding acts as a UPnP Control Point that can query media server content directories and serve content to media renderers.

parameter.name: path
parameter.label: Storage Path
parameter.description: Folder path for playlists and favourites. If not set, it will default to $OPENHAB_USERDATA/upnpcontrol. The folder will be created on first use when it does not exist.

addon:addon.name: @text/bindingLabel
addon:addon.description: @text/bindingDescription

addon:addon.name: ValloxMV Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding for online interface of Vallox ventilation unit

addon:addon.name: VDR Binding
addon:addon.description: The Video Disk Recorder (VDR) binding allows to control your own Video Disk Recorder (https://www.tvdr.de).

addon:addon.name: Vektiva Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Vektiva products controlled by local API.

addon:addon.name: Velbus Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Velbus.

addon:addon.name: @text/addon.velux.name
addon:addon.description: @text/addon.velux.description

addon:addon.name: Venstar Thermostats
addon:addon.description: This is a binding for Venstar Thermostats.

addon:addon.name: VentaAir Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Venta Air - Air cleaning and humidifying devices

addon:addon.name: Verisure Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Verisure Alarm System.

addon:addon.name: VeSync Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for the VeSync products. Currently, this supports the Levoit branded Air Purifiers and Humidifiers using the v2 protocol.

addon:addon.name: VigiCrues Binding
addon:addon.description: Retrieves rivers levels and alerts in France

addon:addon.name: Vitotronic Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Vitotronic.

addon:addon.name: Vizio Binding
addon:addon.description: Controls Vizio TVs w/SmartCast API (2016+ Models)

addon:addon.name: Volumio Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Volumio devices.

addon:addon.name: VolvoOnCall Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding enables the access to VolvoOnCall services.

addon:addon.name: Warmup Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for a Warmup 4iE Thermostat primarily used for controlling underfloor heating.

addon:addon.name: Weather Company Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for the Weather Company weather forecast API.

addon:addon.name: WeatherUnderground Binding
addon:addon.description: The Weather Underground Binding requests the Weather Underground Service to show weather data.

addon:addon.name: WebexTeams Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for WebexTeams. Send messages with actions.

addon:addon.name: WebThing Binding
addon:addon.description: The WebThing binding supports an interface to remote devices implementing the Web Thing API.

addon:addon.name: WeMo Binding
addon:addon.description: The WeMo binding integrates Belkin WeMo devices.

addon:addon.name: WiFi LED Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding for WiFi LED devices. These are known as Magic Home RGBW LED, UFO LED, LED NET controller etc.

addon:addon.name: Windcentrale Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding for Windcentrale windmills

addon:addon.name: WlanThermo Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for WlanThermo, ref. https://wlanthermo.de/

addon:addon.name: WLED Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for WLED

addon:addon.name: WolfSmartset Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for WolfSmartset smart systems.

addon:addon.name: Wunderground Update Receiver Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding enables acting as a receiver of updates from devices that post measurements to https://rtupdate.wunderground.com/weatherstation/updateweatherstation.php.

addon:addon.name: XmlTV Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for reading and parsing XmlTV files

addon:addon.name: XMPPClient Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for XMPP (Jabber) notifications.

addon:addon.name: Yamaha Musiccast Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Yamaha Musiccast

addon:addon.name: YamahaReceiver Binding
addon:addon.description: For all network enabled Yamaha receivers.

addon:addon.name: Yeelight Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for Yeelight products.

addon:addon.name: YIOremote Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for YIOremote.

addon:addon.name: ZoneMinder Binding
addon:addon.description: Binding for ZoneMinder video surveillance system

addon:addon.name: Z-Way Binding
addon:addon.description:
Z-Way is a home automation software to configure and control a Z-Wave network. The ZAutomation interface provides all Z-Wave devices and handles incoming commands. The Z-Way Binding uses this HTTP interface to load all device and make them available during the discovery process.
Currently only a continuous polling is available!

addon:addon.name: HomeKit
addon:addon.description: Exposes openHAB to HomeKit.

addon:addon.name: Hue Emulation
addon:addon.description: Exposes openHAB as Hue Devices.

addon:addon.name: Metrics
addon:addon.description: An additional REST endpoint to retrieve openHAB core metrics.

addon:addon.name: Neeo
addon:addon.description: The openHAB NEEO integration allows mapping of openHAB things/item to a NEEO device/capabilities.

addon:addon.name: openHAB Cloud
addon:addon.description: Connects local instance to the openHAB cloud.

addon:addon.name: Addon Suggestion Finder
addon:addon.description: This is a special addon for finding suggested addons to be installed on setup.

addon:addon.name: DynamoDB Persistence
addon:addon.description: This is the persistence add-on for DynamoDB.

addon:addon.name: InfluxDB Persistence
addon:addon.description: This is the persistence add-on for InfluxDB.

addon:addon.name: InMemory Persistence
addon:addon.description: A volatile persistence service to temporarily store data.

parameter.name: maxEntries
parameter.label: Maximum Entries
parameter.description: The maximum number of values stored for each item (0 = infinite).

addon:addon.name: JPA Persistence
addon:addon.description: This is the persistence add-on for JPA.

addon:addon.name: MapDB Persistence
addon:addon.description: This is the persistence add-on for MapDB.

addon:addon.name: MongoDB Persistence
addon:addon.description: This is the persistence add-on for MongoDB.

addon:addon.name: RRD4J Persistence
addon:addon.description: This is the persistence add-on for RRD4J.

addon:addon.name: BIN2JSON transformation
addon:addon.description: Transforms the input by Java Binary Block Parser syntax.

addon:addon.name: Exec transformation
addon:addon.description: Transforms an input string with an external program.

addon:addon.name: Jinja Transformation
addon:addon.description: Transforms a value using a jinja template.

addon:addon.name: JSONPATH transformation
addon:addon.description: Extracts values from a JSON string using a JSONPATH expression.

addon:addon.name: MAP transformation
addon:addon.description: Transforms the input by mapping it to another string.

addon:addon.name: Regex transformation
addon:addon.description: Transforms a source string on basis of the regular expression (regex) search pattern.

addon:addon.name: Roller Shutter Position Emulation
addon:addon.description: Emulates absolute position setting for roller shutter devices which only support basic UP/DOWN/STOP commands.

addon:addon.name: Scale transformation
addon:addon.description: Transforms a numerical input to a string.

addon:addon.name: VAT transformation
addon:addon.description: Transforms the input by adding Value-Added Tax according to configured country or percentage.

addon:addon.name: XPATH transformation
addon:addon.description: Extracts values from an XML string with the XPATH syntax.

addon:addon.name: XSLT transformation
addon:addon.description: Transform input using the XML Stylesheet Language for Transformations (XSLT).

addon:addon.name: Action Template Interpreter
addon:addon.description: A human language interpreter implementation powered by OpenNLP.

addon:addon.name: Google Cloud Speech-to-Text
addon:addon.description: Google Cloud STT Service uses the non-free Google Cloud Speech-to-Text API to transcript audio data to text.

addon:addon.name: Google Cloud Test-to-speech
addon:addon.description: Google Cloud TTS Service uses the non-free Google Cloud Text-to-Speech API to convert text or Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) input into audio data of natural human speech.

addon:addon.name: macOS Text-to-Speech
addon:addon.description: The macOS Text-to-Speech (TTS) service uses the macOS "say" command for producing spoken text.

addon:addon.name: Mary Text-to-Speech
addon:addon.description: The Mary Text-to-Speech (TTS) service is a pure Java implementation of a TTS service, which uses the MaryTTS project of DFKI.

addon:addon.name: Mimic Text-to-Speech
addon:addon.description: The Mimic Text-to-Speech (TTS) service uses the offline open source Text-to-Speech engine designed by Mycroft A.I.

addon:addon.name: Pico Text-to-Speech
addon:addon.description: The Pico Text-to-Speech (TTS) service uses the TTS binary from SVOX for producing spoken text.

addon:addon.name: Polly Text-to-Speech
addon:addon.description: PollyTTS is a voice service utilizing the Internet based text-to-speech (TTS) service Amazon Polly.

addon:addon.name: Porcupine Keyword Spotter
addon:addon.description: This voice service allows you to use the PicoVoice product Porcupine as your keyword spotter in openHAB.

addon:addon.name: Rustpotter Keyword Spotter
addon:addon.description: This voice service allows using the open source project Rustpotter as your keyword spotter in openHAB.

addon:addon.name: VoiceRSS Text-to-Speech
addon:addon.description: VoiceRSS is an Internet based TTS service hosted at https://api.voicerss.org.

addon:addon.name: Vosk Speech-to-Text
addon:addon.description: Vosk STT Service uses vosk-api to perform offline speech-to-text in openHAB.

addon:addon.name: IBM Watson Speech-to-Text
addon:addon.description: Watson STT Service uses the non-free IBM Watson Speech-to-Text API to transcript audio data to text.
